div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1165 Asia Minor, western, before 1893 Burial: c. 500 B.C. Contents: 1 EL, 75+ AE Athens: 1 didr.; 3 fr. Andros: 1 dr. Abydus: 2 fr. Lampsacus?: 1 EL twenty-fourth Ephesus: 2 fr. Miletus: 4 fr. Phocaea: 3 fr. Teos: 18 fr. Chios: 1 didr. Cos: 1 fr. Unc. mints: 39 dr.; fr. Disposition: London 45; Copenhagen 27 MÃ¸rkholm, SNR 1971, pp. 79-91, illus.
